BigDataClass.org
  • Getting Started
  • Exercise 1: Tf-Idf (Java)
  • Exercise 2: Tf-Idf (Scala)

Welcome to BigDataClass.org!

We have set up this website to educate more people in the field of Big Data! We are a group of developers from the Stratosphere analytics system.

Before you get started on the exercises please go to Getting Started to learn how to get the example code and set-up your development environment.

Go to Exercise 1 if you are a Java programmer.

Go to Exercise 2 if you are already or want to become a Scala developer (Recommended!)

Contact

If you have questions for the assignments, write on our Google Group use the comments on each page or open an issue on GitHub

Contribute

This Website is just another GitHub Repository so you can open a pull request if you want to add something (YouTube videos, new exercise, nicer homepage) Both the website (see gh-pages branch) and the exercise skeletons are on the Repository.
